encyclopedia.content: violet是紫罗兰家纺的英文简称。也是韩国星际争霸职业选手于正浩的英文ID。 韩国星际争霸职业选手个人信息 游戏ID:Violet[WHITE]简写ID:Violet 其余ID:Violet[Name] 种 族：Protoss 俱乐部：KT 昵 称：阿紫 韩文名：우정호 中文名：于正浩 英文名：Woo Jung Ho 生 日：1988年09月30日 现 役：现役 --以下数据只统计KeSPA认可赛事--(更多可见：YYDB) 所有ALL战绩：54:56 胜率：49% 锛埞110场锛 [

entry.def: A violet is a small plant that has purple or white flowers in the spring.
Something that is violet is a bluish-purple colour.

example.ex: The light was beginning to drain from a violet sky.
example.tran: 光线开始从紫罗兰色的天空渐渐消退。

entry.def: If you say that someone is no shrinking violet, you mean that they are not at all shy.

example.ex: When it comes to expressing himself he is no shrinking violet...
example.tran: 他在表达自己的想法时毫不羞怯。

example.ex: None of the women he paints, however, could be described as shrinking violets.
example.tran: 然而，他画过的所有女人中没有一个是羞涩腼腆的。

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous low-growing small-flowered violas
2. a variable color that lies beyond blue in the spectrum
1. of a color midway between red and blue
